summary: The document is a forensic analysis report from ABC Forensic Services Laboratory regarding a Glock 17 pistol and related items submitted by Bramblewood County Sheriffâ€™s Office. The pistol was test fired, and a cartridge case was entered into NIBIN, leading to a potential investigative lead connecting two cases. The unfired cartridges were not utilized in the examination.
conclusion: A NIBIN investigative lead was developed indicating a possible association between two cases, but this association has not been confirmed.

events.details: The Glock 17 pistol was test fired and a cartridge case was entered into NIBIN.

description: Black in color Glock 17 pistol, 9x19mm caliber (S/N: obliterated)
Unloaded black in color Glock 9mm magazine
Laboratory test cartridge case fired by Item BCSO-3 (Glock 17 pistol)
Entered into NIBIN and led to a potential investigative lead
Stray bronze and silver in color 9mm unfired cartridges with Luger headstamp
